projects.title: Valentine2024
bullets: A website to ask somebody to be your Valentine. The catch is, they can't say no!
Built to explore and learn about modern web frameworks: Svelte and Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Vizia
bullets: Wearable glasses that can extract and communicate information from an image to a visually impaired user through audio transcription
Consists of glasses with Raspberry Pi for image capture, Flask web app for computer vision processing, and an iOS app for audio playback
Developed as a Capstone Design Project at the University of Waterloo

projects.title: This Website!
bullets: Fully designed and built by me
Bootstrap used for responsive layout and as a React component library
Sass mixins used to efficiently style light and dark themes

projects.title: Autonomous Robot Racing
bullets: Managed development for a robot that competed in the International Autonomous Robot Racing Competition
Developed software architecture in ROS and C++ for perception, mapping, and path planning using a stereo camera, IMU, and LiDAR sensor
Built as apart of the UW Robotics Team

projects.title: Synviz
bullets: Built an IoT device that could decode spoken text from facial input
Developed a backend web server in Python using Flask, GCP, OpenCV, and TensorFlow
Won 3rd place at UofTHacks VII

projects.title: Bicycle Sensor
bullets: Built as apart of a course project for ECE298
Designed hardware and software for an ultrasonic object detection module aimed at cyclists on the MSP430 low power MCU platform

projects.title: Agilite
bullets: Built an image processing pipeline in Python using OpenCV and TensorFlow capable of recognizing handwritten text from an agile board
Integrated the output of image pipeline with a frontend implemented using Vue.js
Built at DeltaHacks V

projects.title: JukeBox
bullets: An Arduino based jukebox that supports selection and playback between 5 songs
One of my earliest projects that first got me excited about computers and programming
